conversion_verification.notes: The 3D model presents a faithful isometric cutaway. However, the plan appears to have been mirrored horizontally during the generation process.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D depth, wall thickness, and isometric projection. Floor planes and wall geometry are well-defined.

geometric_accuracy.notes: The layout has been horizontally mirrored relative to the source 2D plan. While room counts and adjacencies are preserved within this mirrored context, the orientation is flipped.

interior_elements.notes: High-quality representative furniture including beds, dining set, and kitchen fixtures. Placed accurately according to the rooms.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean rendering. Geometry is sharp and distinguishable. No UI text contamination.

detected_errors.description: The entire layout is mirrored (flipped horizontally) compared to the 2D source document.

summary: A structurally sound and visually clean 3D conversion that is geometrically accurate but unfortunately mirrored in orientation.
